extension.description: Complemento no oficial de Plex para Kodi
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not supported by Plex
Este add-on no está respaldado por Plex
Dieses Addon wird nicht von der Firma Plex Inc. unterstützt
extension.news: - Home: Add "Minimize" and "Exit" options to user menu (touch based devices can't easily hit the exit menu by using BACK) - CE/LG: AlternateSeek: Re-Allow seeking to 0 (introduced with RC4) - CE/LG: AlternateSeek: Revert massive default window of +/- 10s for a valid seek (broken since RC4) - CE/LG: AlternateSeek: Implement AltSeekValidSeekWindow (default: +/- 2000ms); during this window, allow +2000ms for the valid window based on this setting (to compensate for playing media while seeking) - CE/LG: Select the correct timestamp after seeking - SeekDialog/CE/LG: Clamp seek steps to at least the valid window - AddonSettings: Add "\"Use alternate seek\" valid seek window"" to control the behaviour of Alternate Seek's seek confirmation; default: 2000ms (not translated yet) - Core: Slightly re-jig waitForOpen - Core: Optionally allow direct play for resolutions above 4K - AddonSettings: Add setting "Unlock Direct Play for above 4K" (untranslated) - KodiGUI: Be less aggressive when waiting for initial open of Background/Home - Player: Fix rare traceback when quickly starting and ending video playback
